Package gw.api.util

Class CurrencyUtil

java.lang.Object
gw.api.util.CurrencyUtil
public class CurrencyUtil extends Object
Helpful methods for dealing with currencies and currency conversion.
Author:
tmoore

  • Constructor Details

    • CurrencyUtil

      public CurrencyUtil()

  • Method Details

    • getMarketExchangeRate

      public static BigDecimal getMarketExchangeRate(Currency from, Currency to)
      Get the ExchangeRate by which to multiply the amount in the from Currency to get the equivalent amount in the to currency. null Currency is treated as the Default currency
      Parameters:
      from - base currency converting from
      to - currency you are converting to.
      Returns:
      rate, such that FromCurrencyAmount * rate = ToCurrencyAmount.

    • getMarketExchangeRateEntity

      @Deprecated public static ExchangeRate getMarketExchangeRateEntity(Currency from, Currency to)
      Deprecated.
      This method has been deprecated across all products in favor of the new FXRate functionality, provided via the IFXRatePlugin implementation. This method was previously used out of the box only in ClaimCenter. You can keep using it if you have set the 'UseDeprecatedExchangeRates' property to true, and are continuing to use the legacy exchange rate implementation provided in older versions of ClaimCenter If you are migrating to use the new FXRate implementation, please remove all custom usages of this method in favor of the new APIs. For more information, please see the product documentation.
      Get the ExchangeRateEntity that contains an exchange rate from one currency to another. null Currency is treated as the Default currency.
      Parameters:
      from - base currency converting from
      to - currency you are converting to.
      Returns:
      ExchangeRateEntity, such that FromCurrencyAmount * rate = ToCurrencyAmount.

    • getReportingCurrency

      public static Currency getReportingCurrency()
      Get the reporting currency (same as Default currency for now).

    • getDefaultCurrency

      public static Currency getDefaultCurrency()
      Get the default currency, specified in the DefaultApplicationCurrency config.xml parameter.

    • getDefaultBaseCurrencies

      public static List<Currency> getDefaultBaseCurrencies()
      Get the default base currencies, specified in the DefaultApplicationBaseCurrencies config.xml parameter.

      The currency defined by efaultApplicationCurrency is always present in this list, presented always as the first element, even if it is not specified in the configuration.

      Returns:
      a list of base currencies.

    • getRoundingMode

      public static RoundingMode getRoundingMode()
      The Default RoundingMode to the be used during monetary calculations. The is the enum value for the config parameter DefaultRoundingMode in config.xml See Java's enum RoundingMode for possible values. See also Transaction.RoundingMode.

    • convertAmount

      @Deprecated public static CurrencyAmount convertAmount(BigDecimal amount, Currency amountCurrency, Currency toCurrency, BigDecimal exchangeRateOverride)
      Deprecated.
      This method has been deprecated across all products in favor of the new FXRate functionality, provided via the IFXRatePlugin implementation. This method was previously used out of the box only in ClaimCenter. You can keep using it if you have set the 'UseDeprecatedExchangeRates' property to true, and are continuing to use the legacy exchange rate implementation provided in older versions of ClaimCenter If you are migrating to use the new FXRate implementation, please remove all custom usages of this method in favor of the new APIs. For more information, please see the product documentation.
      Converts the BigDecimal amount in the given amountCurrency to a CurrencyAmount with toCurrency, using the given ExchangeRate. If ExchangeRate is null, looks up the current market rate.
      Parameters:
      exchangeRateOverride - the new amount is amount.multiply(exchangeRateOverride). If null, looks up the currency market rate.

    • convertAmount

      @Deprecated public static CurrencyAmount convertAmount(BigDecimal amount, Currency amountCurrency, Currency toCurrency, BigDecimal exchangeRateOverride, boolean rateIsToCurrencyRate)
      Deprecated.
      This method has been deprecated across all products in favor of the new FXRate functionality, provided via the IFXRatePlugin implementation. This method was previously used out of the box only in ClaimCenter. You can keep using it if you have set the 'UseDeprecatedExchangeRates' property to true, and are continuing to use the legacy exchange rate implementation provided in older versions of ClaimCenter If you are migrating to use the new FXRate implementation, please remove all custom usages of this method in favor of the new APIs. For more information, please see the product documentation.
      Converts the BigDecimal amount in the given amountCurrency to a CurrencyAmount with toCurrency, using the given ExchangeRate. If ExchangeRate is null, looks up the current market Rate. Uses the default rounding mode returned by getRoundingMode().
      Parameters:
      exchangeRateOverride - the exchange rate to use instead of a current market rate
      rateIsToCurrencyRate - direction of the exchangeRate. if true (default), new amount is amount.multiply(exchangeRate). if false, new amount is amount.divide(exchangeRate).

    • convertAmount

      public static CurrencyAmount convertAmount(BigDecimal amount, Currency amountCurrency, Currency toCurrency, BigDecimal exchangeRateOverride, boolean rateIsToCurrencyRate, RoundingMode roundingMode)
      Converts the BigDecimal amount in the given amountCurrency to a CurrencyAmount with toCurrency, using the given ExchangeRate. If ExchangeRate is null, looks up the current market Rate.
      Parameters:
      exchangeRateOverride - the exchange rate to use instead of a current market rate
      rateIsToCurrencyRate - direction of the exchangeRate. if true (default), new amount is amount.multiply(exchangeRate). if false, new amount is amount.divide(exchangeRate).
      roundingMode - roundingMode to use when rounding result to match the storageScale of toCurrency Use Transaction.RoundingMode if appropriate. null will use CurrencyUtil.RoundingMode.

    • convertAmount

      @Deprecated public static CurrencyAmount convertAmount(IMoney amount, Currency amountCurrency, Currency toCurrency, BigDecimal exchangeRateOverride)
      Deprecated.
      Use CurrencyAmount.convert(typekey.Currency, java.math.BigDecimal, java.math.RoundingMode) instead.
      Converts the CurrencyAmount in the given amountCurrency to a CurrencyAmount with toCurrency, using the given ExchangeRate. If ExchangeRate is null, looks up the current market rate.
      Parameters:
      exchangeRateOverride - the new amount is amount.multiply(exchangeRateOverride). If null, looks up the currency market rate.

    • convertAmount

      public static CurrencyAmount convertAmount(IMoney amount, Currency amountCurrency, Currency toCurrency, BigDecimal exchangeRateOverride, boolean rateIsToCurrencyRate)
      Converts the BigDecimal amount in the given amountCurrency to a CurrencyAmount with toCurrency, using the given ExchangeRate. If ExchangeRate is null, looks up the current market Rate. Uses the default rounding mode returned by getRoundingMode().
      Parameters:
      exchangeRateOverride - the exchange rate to use instead of a current market rate
      rateIsToCurrencyRate - direction of the exchangeRate. if true (default), new amount is amount.multiply(exchangeRate). if false, new amount is amount.divide(exchangeRate).

    • convertAmount

      public static CurrencyAmount convertAmount(IMoney amount, Currency amountCurrency, Currency toCurrency, BigDecimal exchangeRateOverride, boolean rateIsToCurrencyRate, RoundingMode roundingMode)
      Converts the BigDecimal amount in the given amountCurrency to a CurrencyAmount with toCurrency, using the given ExchangeRate. If ExchangeRate is null, looks up the current market Rate.
      Parameters:
      exchangeRateOverride - the exchange rate to use instead of a current market rate
      rateIsToCurrencyRate - direction of the exchangeRate. if true (default), new amount is amount.multiply(exchangeRate). if false, new amount is amount.divide(exchangeRate).
      roundingMode - roundingMode to use when rounding result to match the storageScale of toCurrency Use Transaction.RoundingMode if appropriate. null will use CurrencyUtil.RoundingMode.

    • roundToCurrencyScale

      public static CurrencyAmount roundToCurrencyScale(BigDecimal amount, Currency currency, RoundingMode roundingMode)
      Round to the scale/fraction digits (i.e. storageScale) for the CurrencyAmount's currency. A null currency arg will round to the storageScale of the default currency.

    • getStorageScale

      public static int getStorageScale(Currency currency)
      Get the storage scale of the currency.

    • addSecondaryMoneyComponent

      public static CurrencyAmountPair addSecondaryMoneyComponent(CurrencyAmount primaryAmount, Currency secondaryCurrency, BigDecimal exchangeRate)
      Calls primaryAmount.addSecondaryMoneyComponent, unless primaryAmount is null.
      Returns:
      primaryAmount.addSecondaryMoneyComponent(secondaryCurrency, exchangeRate)

    • invokeMarketExchangeRateSetPlugin

      @Deprecated public static void invokeMarketExchangeRateSetPlugin()
      Deprecated.
      This method has been deprecated across all products in favor of the new FXRate functionality, provided via the IFXRatePlugin implementation. This method was previously used out of the box only in ClaimCenter. You can keep using it if you have set the 'UseDeprecatedExchangeRates' property to true, and are continuing to use the legacy exchange rate implementation provided in older versions of ClaimCenter If you are migrating to use the new FXRate implementation, please remove all custom usages of this method in favor of the new APIs. For more information, please see the product documentation.
      Creates and commits a new ExchangeRateSet using IExchangeRateSetPlugin.

    • isMultiCurrencyMode

      public static boolean isMultiCurrencyMode()
      True if the UI should be in multi-currency mode.

    • isSingleCurrencyMode

      public static boolean isSingleCurrencyMode()
      True if the UI should be in single-currency mode.

    • renderAsCurrency

      public static String renderAsCurrency(IMoney amount)
      Returns a string representing the CurrencyAmount argument. Renders null as blank. Renders zero as the number 0, instead of using zeroValue attribute from CurrencyFormat.
      Parameters:
      amount - the CurrencyAmount to display as a string
      Returns:
      string representing the CurrencyAmount

    • renderAsCurrency

      public static String renderAsCurrency(BigDecimal amount, Currency currency)
      Returns a string representing the BigDecimal formatted as a money amount in the given Currency. Renders null as blank. Renders zero as the number 0, instead of using zeroValue attribute from CurrencyFormat.
      Parameters:
      amount - the CurrencyAmount to display as a string
      Returns:
      string representing the CurrencyAmount

    • renderAsCurrency

      public static String renderAsCurrency(BigDecimal amount, Currency currency, boolean useZeroValue)
      Returns a string representing the BigDecimal formatted as a money amount in the given Currency. Renders null as blank. Uses the zeroValue attribute from CurrencyFormat if the useZeroValue argument is true.
      Parameters:
      amount - the BigDecimal amount to display as a string
      currency - the currency format to use
      useZeroValue - true if the zeroValue attribute, such as a "-", should be used. false to render zero as a number.
      Returns:
      string representing the CurrencyAmount

    • calcInverseExchangeRate

      public static BigDecimal calcInverseExchangeRate(BigDecimal exchangeRate)
      Calculates ONE divided by the given exchangeRate, rounded to the precision of ExchangeRates in the system. Consider using instead: convertAmount(BigDecimal, typekey.Currency, Currency, BigDecimal, boolean).

    • createCustomExchangeRateWithSet

      @Deprecated public static ExchangeRate createCustomExchangeRateWithSet(BigDecimal exchangeRate, String description, Currency fromCurrency, Currency toCurrency, Bundle bundle)
      Deprecated.
      This method has been deprecated across all products in favor of the new FXRate functionality, provided via the IFXRatePlugin implementation. This method was previously used out of the box only in ClaimCenter. You can keep using it if you have set the 'UseDeprecatedExchangeRates' property to true, and are continuing to use the legacy exchange rate implementation provided in older versions of ClaimCenter If you are migrating to use the new FXRate implementation, please remove all custom usages of this method in favor of the new APIs. For more information, please see the product documentation.
      Creates a custom ExchangeRate entity for when the user provides a manual exchangeRate override.

      Only exposed to Gosu for use with RITransactionSet.newXXX() methods, in order to pass in a custom ExchangeRate for the ClaimToReportingExchangeRate when creating a new RITransaction.

      For Transaction, BulkInvoice, and other multicurrency entities, you should use fields on those entities to setup a manual exchange rate, such as the OverrideTransToClaimExchangeRate and TransToClaimExchangeRateRate properties on Transaction.

    • createMarketExchangeRateSet

      @Deprecated public static ExchangeRateSet createMarketExchangeRateSet(String name, String description, Date effectiveDate, Date expireDate, List<ExchangeRate> rates)
      Deprecated.
      This method has been deprecated across all products in favor of the new FXRate functionality, provided via the IFXRatePlugin implementation. This method was previously used out of the box only in ClaimCenter. You can keep using it if you have set the 'UseDeprecatedExchangeRates' property to true, and are continuing to use the legacy exchange rate implementation provided in older versions of ClaimCenter If you are migrating to use the new FXRate implementation, please remove all custom usages of this method in favor of the new APIs. For more information, please see the product documentation.
      Creates an ExchangeRateSet based on a collection of market ExchangeRates
      Parameters:
      expireDate - if null, the ExchangeRateSet doesn't expire
      rates - cannot be null or empty

    • createExchangeRate

      @Deprecated public static ExchangeRate createExchangeRate(Currency baseCurrency, Currency priceCurrency, BigDecimal rate)
      Deprecated.
      This method has been deprecated across all products in favor of the new FXRate functionality, provided via the IFXRatePlugin implementation. This method was previously used out of the box only in ClaimCenter. You can keep using it if you have set the 'UseDeprecatedExchangeRates' property to true, and are continuing to use the legacy exchange rate implementation provided in older versions of ClaimCenter If you are migrating to use the new FXRate implementation, please remove all custom usages of this method in favor of the new APIs. For more information, please see the product documentation.
      Creates an ExchangeRate without an ExchangeRateSet in the current Gosu bundle (Transaction.Current)

    • getCurrencyFormatExpression

      public static String getCurrencyFormatExpression(Currency currency)
      Generates a Pebbles formatting expression for the indicated currency. The resulting expression prefixes the field with the currency's symbol (e.g., $) and appends the currency's abbreviation (e.g., USD, EUR, GBP, etc.) as a suffix.
      Parameters:
      currency - the Currency for which to generate a formatting expression
      Returns:
      a String containing the Pebbles formatting expression.

    • checkCurrencyAmountCurrency

      public static CurrencyAmount checkCurrencyAmountCurrency(CurrencyAmount value, Currency requiredCurrency)
      Deprecated.
      Not needed now that CurrencyAmount no longer extends BigDecimal.
      Checks the value of a BigDecimal or CurrencyAmount to be set in a money column to see if it has the required Currency.

      Note: In the future this may round the value based on the storageScale of the Currency.

      Parameters:
      value - BigDecimal or CurrencyAmount
      requiredCurrency - currency in which a CurrencyAmount value must be. Use the Currency entity property for the money amount column value. For example: TransactionLineItem.Transaction.Currency or Check.Currency
      Returns:
      the same value if OK, or throws IllegalArgumentException if a CurrencyAmount with wrong currency.

    • cleanseCurrency

      public static BigDecimal cleanseCurrency(CurrencyAmount value)
      Deprecated.
      Not needed now that CurrencyAmount no longer extends BigDecimal. Use CurrencyAmount.getAmount() instead.
      Ensures a BigDecimal/CurrencyAmount does not have a currency.
      Parameters:
      value - BigDecimal or CurrencyAmount
      Returns:
      the same value if OK (a BigDecimal or CurrencyAmount with null currency) or a new BigDecimal.

      Parses a string into a BigDecimal
      Parameters:

      currency -
      Returns:
      BigDecimal
      Throws:
      ParseException
      Exception

      public static CurrencyAmount toCurrencyAmount(String value, Currency currency) throws ParseException
      Parses a string into a CurrencyAmount
      Parameters:

      currency -
      Returns:
      CurrencyAmount
      Throws:
      ParseException
